segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness watching this ordinary kitchen turn chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her routine, unaware of the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down, ruining the peaceful moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, soon she'll realize and be upset.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children trying to be sneaky with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks so unstable, it breaks my heart thinking of a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretching high, full of innocent adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waiting patiently, eyes full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This should be a happy family scene, not one of impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems idyllic, highlighting the indoor sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying dishes should be simple, not lead to this melancholy sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar tempts them, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR
